attributes.description: This Amarok is absolutely spotless. Great features and a lot of power, this is a great choice for your next double cab bakkie. This 4motion Amarok is amazing to use for off-road although you can see this bakkie only ever saw tar road. It is an extremely comfortable drive and this bakkie has a full service histoy. Low mileage and exceptionally well maintained. Features include: Navigation, Rubberized load bin, secure lid, reverse camera, PDC, Bluetooth, multi-function steering wheel, cruise control, touch screen radio, tow bar and more
